articles.title: Cathie Wood Sells More Tesla Stock. Q4 Deliveries Loom But The Market May Not Care.
articles.mainIdea: Cathie Wood Sells More Tesla Stock. Q4 Deliveries Loom But The Market May Not Care.
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Cathie Wood Sells More Tesla Stock. Q4 Deliveries Loom But The Market May Not Care.. Cathie Wood's Ark Invest is shifting money into crypto, even as Tesla stock hits highs on market bets for self-driving, shrugging off deliveries. Related tickers mentioned: TSLA.

articles.title: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.
articles.mainIdea: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.. Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on X that Tesla’s robo-taxis were unaffected. Coming into Tuesday trading, Tesla stock was up 21% this year, boosted by a 25% jump over the past month, despite falling EV sales. Recent share gains have left Tesla stock trading for about 225 times estimated 2026 earnings. Related tickers mentioned: ARKQ, TSLA, ^DJI, ^GSPC.
